document.full_text: a greek debt default would hurt other peripheral euro zone states, moody's said in a statement on tuesday, becoming the last of the three major rating agencies to say any kind of restructuring would constitute default.
document.title: greek default would hit others in euro zone
lines_and_colors: a greek debt default would hurt other peripheral euro zone states, moody's said in a statement on tuesday, becoming the last of the three major rating agencies to say any kind of restructuring would constitute default.
